content_html: A telephone conversation took place today between Prime Minister Sushila Karki of Nepal and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that Prime Minister Karki spoke with her Indian counterpart from the Office of the Prime Minister and Council of Ministers in Singha Durbar, Kathmandu

title: Telephone Conversation Between Prime Ministers Karki and Modi
